EmailTemplate.name: 201706_Global_Nurture_FMS6.1_mih.201706_Global_Nurture_S2-3_FMS6.1_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Schedule Your Quick and Easy FMS 6.1 Upgrade
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/FMSNotice_2017.html]]> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Did you know that upgrading to Honeywell’s FMS 6.1 is quick and easy? That’s right! The process is very quick and it can be done in just a few, short hours, which is perfect for your next business trip.
Here’s how easy it is to upgrade to FMS 6.1:
Option 1: Contact Honeywell by using the link below to find a service center near you! Don’t worry – there are more than 350 of them worldwide!
Option 2: Complete the upgrade on-wing with a portable laptop supplied by Chippewa Aerospace. Contact us by using the link below and we’ll help you coordinate it!
Customers who do not upgrade to FMS v6.1 prior to December 31, 2017 will be charged an additional 20% surcharge to their annual navigational database subscription. Honeywell will no longer provide technical support for FMS versions prior to v.6.1 after December 31, 2018, but will continue to support navigational database updates. Customers are encouraged to upgrade their FMS subscription before their next renewal cycle.
Contact Honeywell today to schedule your quick and easy FMS 6.1 upgrade.
UPGRADE TODAY <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/FMSNotice_2017.html]]>
